amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the National Telecommunications and Information Administration by $5 million to issue grants to upgrade 9-1-1- call centers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase appropriations (by transfer) for the National Telecommunications and Information Administration by $5 million, and reduce appropriations for General Administration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shimkus amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 340 - 87 (Roll no. 723).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Shimkus.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Shimkus amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 340 - 87 (Roll no. 723).
